metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10380 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
RMySQL through 0.10.19 allows SQL Injection.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-cran-rmysql - 0.10.20-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rmysql package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.20-1').
